mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT WHERE RPT_RESULT=1

SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC (TB_REPORT RPT_DATE)*/ R.RPT_NO, R.M_ID, R.TARGET_ID, R.RPT_DATE, S.RPT_RESN, M.M_STATUS, R.TARGET_NO FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN S, TB_MEMBER M WHERE R.RPT_CAT_NO = S.RPT_CAT_NO AND R.TARGET_ID = M.M_ID AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y' AND RPT_RESULT = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N, TB_MEMBER M, TB_MEMBER_SORT S WHERE R.TARGET_NO = M.M_NO AND R.RPT_CAT_NO = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = S.M_SORT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = 1 AND R.RPT_RESULT = 1 AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.RPT_NO, R.M_ID, R.TARGET_ID, N.RPT_RESN, R.RPT_DATE, M.M_SORT_NO, R.TARGET_NO FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N, TB_MEMBER M, TB_MEMBER_SORT S WHERE R.TARGET_NO = M.M_NO AND R.RPT_CAT_NO = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = S.M_SORT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = 1 AND R.RPT_RESULT = 1 AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N, TB_MEMBER M, TB_MEMBER_SORT S WHERE R.TARGET_NO = M.M_NO AND R.RPT_CAT_NO = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = S.M_SORT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = 2 AND R.RPT_RESULT = 1 AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.RPT_NO, R.M_ID, R.TARGET_ID, N.RPT_RESN, R.RPT_DATE, M.M_SORT_NO, R.TARGET_NO FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N, TB_MEMBER M, TB_MEMBER_SORT S WHERE R.TARGET_NO = M.M_NO AND R.RPT_CAT_NO = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = S.M_SORT_NO AND M.M_SORT_NO = 2 AND R.RPT_RESULT = 1 AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N
R.TARGET_CATEGORY = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND R.M_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' AND R.RPT_RESULT = '1'

SELECT R.RPT_NO, TARGET_CATEGORY, M_ID, TARGET_ID, N.RPT_RESN, RPT_DATE FROM TB_REPORT R, TB_REPORT_RESN N
R.TARGET_CATEGORY = N.RPT_CAT_NO AND R.M_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' AND R.RPT_RESULT = '1'
ORDER BY R.RPT_NO DESC
